description: This script uses PBS (Portable Batch System) to submit a batch job that runs a series of simulations and analysis using plom, simul, and simplex software. It uses a Latin Hypercube Sampling (LHS) design to explore parameter space, and performs simplex optimization to find the best parameter values.  It utilizes a series of steps to progressively refine the parameter estimates. The script leverages array jobs to run multiple simulations in parallel.
